attributes.action: condemn the arrest by anti-terrorism police officers of the Shadow Minister For Immigration, Damian Green.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We are in danger of becoming a Police State when elected opposition MPs are arrested for nothing other than highlighting management deficiencies within the Home Office. If you care for democracy in the UK, please sign this petition.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
